original_title: Virgin Prunes ‎– Sons Find Devils - A Live Retrospective 1981-1983
overview: Includes performances of Over The Rainbow, Uncle Arthur's Lonely World, Ulakanakulot: Decline And Fall, Pagan Lovesong, New Form Of Beauty, Walls Of Jericho, Caucasion Walk, Bernie & Attracta Sing, Rhetoric, The Pig Children, Come To Daddy
title: Virgin Prunes ‎– Sons Find Devils - A Live Retrospective 1981-1983
